content: these lovely fingerless gloves 1 are crocheted with hurricane a soft acrylic yarn perfect for keeping your hands warm you can crochet a matching cowl for your gloves and look magnificent in the cold weather have fun **info ** half a cake will be enough to make these fingerless gloves with 1 cake you can make the gloves and the salt and pepper cowl that matches the gloves **skill level ** beginner **measurements ** wrist width 10 5 cm fingers section width 10 cm length 20 cm **crochet hook ** 4 mm us size g **materials ** sewing needle for weaving in the ends scissors **gauge ** 14 sts = 10 cm 13 row = 10 cm in the stitch pattern used **yarn ** hurricane film noir #8 - 1 cake **abbreviations used in this pattern ** **chain** - chain **single_crochet** - single_crochet **double_crochet** - double_crochet **bpdc** - back post double_crochet insert the hook from back to front = right space of a post and then from front to back = left space of same post work the double_crochet around the post of a stitch **fpdc** - front post double_crochet yarn over insert the hook from front to back = right space of a post and then from back to front =left space of same post work the double_crochet around the post of the stitch **slip_stitch** - slip_stitch **st s ** - stitch es * repeat section **r|** - row/round **final measurements** this pattern is available in one size wrist width a 10 5 cm fingers section width b 10 cm length c 20 cm 1 https //hobbii com/salt-and-pepper-fingerless-gloves utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=salt-and-pepper-fingerless-gloves+hbtrack&utm_term=swr
